site_description: CraneR Technology is a pioneering Hong Kong high-tech company specializing in intelligent construction machinery. We integrate AI, IoT, and automated control systems to enhance construction safety, efficiency, and sustainability. Supported by InnoHK HKCRC.
site_keywords: intelligent construction, AI crane system, construction technology, tower crane AI, construction safety, IoT construction, smart construction, automated crane, Hong Kong construction tech, InnoHK, HKCRC
og_description: Transforming construction with AI-powered crane systems, IoT integration, and automated control. Enhancing safety and efficiency on construction sites worldwide.

parallaxSection.slogan: Empowering Every Evolution of Construction through Engineering Intelligence
parallaxSection.desc: Born in Hong Kong, CraneR is a high-tech company transforming advanced research into scalable engineering solutions. By integrating AI, IoT, and automatic control technologies, we redefine how construction machinery operates—reducing on-site risks, improving efficiency and quality, and driving the construction industry from experience-based practices toward data- and intelligence-driven development.

form.success2: We welcome your communication and cooperation at any time
form.success1: Thank you for your interest in us!

lite.toHome: Learn more about our corporate services
lite.title2: Driving the Future of Construction with Technology and Innovation

video_prompts_module.feature_01_title: Bringing Construction Sites Fully into the Intelligent Era
video_prompts_module.feature_01_intro: From intelligent tower cranes to AI safety systems, to high-precision intelligent lifting equipment, CraneR builds an engineering intelligence product matrix covering 'Perception—Decision—Execution', continuously creating quantifiable value improvements for the construction industry.
video_prompts_module.feature1_01_desc: Engineering has boundaries, intelligence has judgment—making every lift safe and precise
video_prompts_module.feature1_02_desc: Intelligence that is not just visible, but stable

news_sections.author: CraneR Technology
news_sections.title: Innovative Technology, Leading the Future
news_sections.subtitle: We are committed to driving construction technology innovation together
news_sections.news_1_title: HKCRC's First AI Crane System Successfully Deployed in Hong Kong Pak Tin Estate Redevelopment Project, Setting New Standards for Public Housing Construction Safety and Efficiency
news_sections.news_1_subtitle: The AI crane system (tower crane, known as 'tower crane' in Mainland China and 'crane' in Hong Kong) developed by InnoHK Hong Kong Centre for Intelligent Construction Research and Development (HKCRC) was successfully applied for the first time in the Hong Kong Housing Authority's Pak Tin Estate Phase 13 public housing redevelopment project, achieving dual transformation of site safety and construction efficiency through innovative technology.
news_sections.news_2_title: Hong Kong's First Territory-Wide AI Crane System Pilot Project Successfully Launched
news_sections.news_2_subtitle: The Hong Kong Housing Authority's Pak Tin Estate Phase 13 public housing redevelopment project has introduced an AI crane system, significantly improving site safety and construction efficiency through intelligent monitoring and early warning functions.
news_sections.news_3_title: AI Crane System Successfully Applied in Hong Kong Housing Authority Pak Tin Estate Phase 13 Public Housing Redevelopment Project
news_sections.news_3_subtitle: The AI crane system has been successfully applied in the Hong Kong Housing Authority's Pak Tin Estate Phase 13 public housing redevelopment project, significantly improving site safety and construction efficiency through intelligent monitoring and early warning functions.

business_box.title: Smart Tower Crane Hardware Architecture Solution
business_box.subtitle: Deep integration of industrial-grade sensors, vision recognition, and edge computing technologies to provide comprehensive perception capabilities and stable, reliable control foundation for tower cranes.
business_box.card1_desc: Integrated high-resolution vision sensors, load and motion sensors, and wind speed monitoring modules to achieve real-time precise perception of crane operating status and surrounding construction environment.
business_box.card2_desc: Deploy dedicated edge computing cores to support rapid local data processing and low-latency control, ensuring stable and efficient operation even in harsh construction environments.
business_box.card3_desc: Adopt dual-backup communication solutions with 5G and industrial wired networks, combined with modular hardware interfaces, supporting rapid installation, deployment, and future functional expansion, adapting to long-term rigorous operations.

feature_box.label: Modular Solutions
feature_box.title: Integrated Engineering Intelligence Product Matrix
feature_box.desc: Based on a unified CraneR intelligent platform, we provide freely combinable hardware modules and software algorithms to help construction units lower technical entry barriers and rapidly achieve site digitalization and intelligent transformation.
feature_box.featured_desc: Integrated high-precision vision AI and multi-source sensor fusion algorithms to identify risk factors and efficiency bottlenecks in lifting operations in real-time, providing automated operational assistance.
feature_box.atlas_title: Immersive Remote Driving Human-Machine Collaborative System
feature_box.atlas_desc: Based on multi-perspective perception and low-latency control technology, CraneR creates a remote control environment that approaches real driving experience, achieving human-machine collaborative decision-making and precise execution while ensuring safety boundaries.
feature_box.checkout_desc: Automatically generate optimal lifting paths, avoiding on-site obstacles, significantly improving operational efficiency under complex working conditions.
feature_box.payment_links_desc: Real-time monitoring of personnel intrusion under the hook and operator fatigue status, building a 'digital safety brain' for construction sites.
feature_box.billing_title: Digital Operations and Maintenance Management Platform
feature_box.billing_desc: Comprehensive recording of equipment operating data, providing predictive maintenance recommendations, reducing equipment downtime risks.

path_planning.label: Core Algorithm Module
path_planning.title: Intelligent Path Planning System
path_planning.desc: Through high-precision site modeling and real-time obstacle detection, the system can automatically generate optimal lifting paths. Under the premise of ensuring safe distance, it significantly shortens lifting cycle time and reduces operator fatigue.
path_planning.featured_desc: Integrating dynamic anti-collision algorithms and multi-machine coordination technology, the system can perceive the 360° environment around the hook in real-time, automatically correct yaw, and ensure operational safety in complex and narrow spaces.

ai_safety.label: Active Safety and Precise Control
ai_safety.title: AI Safety Detection and Intelligent Stable Hook System
ai_safety.desc: Combining vision AI deep learning with high-frequency dynamic algorithms, we equip tower cranes with 'eyes' and 'brains'. The system can not only identify on-site violations in real-time but also offset inertial swings during lifting operations through algorithms, achieving centimeter-level precise positioning.
ai_safety.featured_title: Multi-Dimensional Safety Protection, Ultimate Stability Experience
ai_safety.featured_desc: AI monitors hook danger zones, operator status, and environmental risks in real-time. Combined with our self-developed stable hook algorithm, even in strong wind conditions, the load remains stable, significantly reducing construction risks.

business_swiper.title: Making Safety No Longer Dependent on Experience and Luck
business_swiper.desc: CraneR AI Safety System uses vision AI and behavior recognition technology to perceive site risks in real-time, identify violations and dangerous conditions in advance, transforming safety management from reactive response to proactive prevention.

CraneR AI Safety System.name: CraneR AI Safety System
CraneR AI Safety System.stat1_desc: AI real-time monitoring of hook danger zones, ensuring safe lifting operations, successfully deployed in multiple projects
CraneR AI Safety System.stat2_desc: 30% reduction in lifting accident rate, 50% reduction in site safety accident rate
CraneR AI Safety System.featured_title: AI-Driven Tower Crane Active Safety Monitoring System—Every Lift Happens in Safety

Safety Supervision System.name: Safety Supervision System
Safety Supervision System.stat1_desc: Full-process digital supervision of construction sites, from entry to completion, full lifecycle safety management.
Safety Supervision System.stat2_desc: Multi-project centralized supervision capability, improving supervision efficiency.
Safety Supervision System.featured_title: Smart CMP Digital Engineering Supervision System—Moving Safety from 'Passive Management' to 'Active Governance'

AI Crane Control System.name: AI Crane Control System
AI Crane Control System.stat1_desc: AI-assisted crane path planning, significantly improving site safety and construction efficiency.
AI Crane Control System.stat2_desc: Complete coverage of planned path generation within the lifting operation space
AI Crane Control System.featured_title: AI Path Planning, AI Stable Hook, AI Collision Avoidance—Significantly Improving Site Safety and Construction Efficiency

4S : Site Safety System.name: 4S : Site Safety System
4S : Site Safety System.stat1_desc: Build a secure future: 4S smart site guardian
4S : Site Safety System.stat2_desc: Multi-project centralized deployment, improving site safety management efficiency.
4S : Site Safety System.featured_title: Leading the new era of safety: 4S smart site system
